titleStmt.title: The Corpus of R. Moses Zacuto’s Correspondence and Lexica of Holy Names: Editions, Tools, and Database

person.note: Dutch-Italian poet and kabbalist who was active in Venice, Mantua, Padua. He was born in 1625 in Amsterdam and died in 1697 in Mantua.
Italian rabbi who was active in Modena and Jerusalem. He was born in 1650 in Modena and died in 1713 in Mantua.
Polish rabbi who was active in Krakow. He was born in 1620 in and died in 1670 in .
Italian rabbi who was active in Venice, Verona. He was born in 1610 in Hamburg and died in 1694-08-22 in Venice.
Italian rabbi and editor who was active in Venice. He was born in in and died in in .
Italian poet and rabbinical scholar who was active in . He was born in -102794 in Mantua and died in after 1703 in Livorno.
Ottoman rabbi and Talmudic scholar who was active in Safed. He was born in in Salonika and died in in .
Ottoman Talmudic scholar who was active in Safed. He was born in in and died in in .
Italian rabbi, poet, physician and Talmudist who was active in Ferrara. He was born in 1630 in and died in 1693 in .
Portuguese kabbalist and physician who was active in Safed, Damascus, Jerusalem. He was born in ca. 1600 in and died in 1667 in Jerusalem.

person.note: Dutch philosopher who was active in Amsterdam. He was born in 1596 in Venice and died in 1660-02-10 in Amsterdam.
Italian rabbi and apologist who was active in Venice. He was born in 1583 in Venice and died in 1663-01-06 in Venice.
